Abkommen lesen …
Mit Pestarzt Jugrinas sprechen
Pestarzt Jugrinas kümmert sich um seine Patienten. Frage ihn, was passiert ist.
Die Arznei gegen die Norbrier-Epidemie einnehmen
Nimm die Arznei gegen die Norbrier-Epidemie ein, die du von Jugrinas erhalten hast.
Mit Jugrinas sprechen
Du hast die Arznei eingenommen. Sprich mit Jugrinas.
Ein Heilmittel für die Epidemie
Frage Jugrinas, was im Norbrier-Wald vorgefallen ist.
Jugrinas' Testlösung zurückholen
Sammle etwas Testlösung aus den Behältern, die Jugrinas am Eingang zum Emmetforst zurückgelassen hat.
Jugrinas das Gewünschte bringen
Du hast die Testlösung eingesammelt. Bringe sie Jugrinas.
Frage Jugrinas, ob er aufgrund der von dir mitgebrachten Testlösung etwas herausfinden konnte.
Epidemiedetektoren an der Norbrier-Kreuzung aufstellen
Jugrinas hofft, dass er mithilfe von Epidemiedetektoren neue Erkenntnisse gewinnen kann. Begib dich zur Norbrier-Kreuzung und stelle die Epidemiedetektoren auf.
Jugrinas Bericht erstatten
Du hast die Epidemiedetektoren aufgestellt. Erstatte Jugrinas Bericht.
Die Detektoren sind jetzt aufgestellt. Frage Jugrinas, was du als Nächstes tun sollst.
Die Probensammelgeräte in der unteren Verladestation suchen
Jugrinas möchte noch etwas anderes tun, während er auf die Reaktion der Detektoren wartet. Begib dich zur unteren Verladestation und hole die Probesammelgeräte.
Pflanzenproben bei den Norbrier-Fällen sammeln
Sammle bei den Norbrier-Fällen einige Proben lokaler Pflanzen.
Du hast die Pflanzenproben gesammelt. Bringe sie Jugrinas.
Sprich mit Jugrinas.
Cicas' Werkzeug beim Übergang am großen Baum suchen
Jugrinas möchte, dass du Proben von Monstern sammelst, während er die Pflanzenproben analysiert. Begib dich zum Übergang am großen Baum und hole Jugrinas' Speziallösung und die Probebehälter.
Monster mit Speziallösung besprühen und sie besiegen
Besprühe die Monster mit Jugrinas' Speziallösung und besiege sie, um Proben einzusammeln.
Du hast genug Monsterproben gesammelt. Kehre zu Jugrinas zurück.
Speziallösung nutzen und %s besiegen
Die Wahrheit hinter der Epidemie
Da du jetzt genug Proben gesammelt hast, kannst du Jugrinas fragen, was er jetzt vorhat.
Die Epidemiedetektoren an der Norbrier-Kreuzung überprüfen
Begib dich zur Norbrier-Kreuzung und überprüfe die dort aufgestellten Epidemiedetektoren.
Epidemiedetektoren bei der Norbrier-Kreuzung einsammeln
Sammle alle an der Norbrier-Kreuzung aufgestellten Epidemiedetektoren wieder ein.
Die Epidemiedetektoren verströmen eine unheilvolle Energie. Bringe sie Jugrinas.
Jugrinas sieht die Detektoren besorgt an. Hör dir an, was er zu sagen hat.
Die Evakuierungsroute auf unheilvolle Energie überprüfen

Jugrinas meint, dass die Norbrier-Epidemie ihren Ursprung in der unheilvollen Energie hat. Begib dich zur Evakuierungsroute und sieh nach, ob du irgendwo eine Quelle dieser unheilvollen Energie entdecken kannst.
Die unheilvolle Energie ging von einem Sensenmann aus. Bringe den vom Sensenmann erhaltenen Kern zu Jugrinas.
Den Sensenmann besiegen
Laimas Prophezeiung
Mit Kupole Lenja sprechen
Sprich mit Kupole Lenja.
Status bei den Prophezeiungspagoden belegen
Kupole Lenja meint, dass du den Pagoden auf dem Pranasiste-Weg beweisen musst, dass du der Retter bist. Stelle dich den drei Steinpagoden und besorge den Folianten mit der Prophezeiung.
Du hast deinen Status bei den Pagoden belegt und den Folianten mit der Prophezeiung erhalten. Kehre zu Kupole Lenja zurück.
Status bei den Prophezeiungspagoden belegen und Folgendes beschaffen: %s
Der Foliant der Prophezeiung scheint leer zu sein. Frage Kupole Lenja, was du jetzt tun sollst.
Die Kraft des Schicksals von der Schicksalskugel erhalten
Um die Prophezeiung im Folianten lesen zu können, benötigst du Laimas Kraft des Schicksals. Erhalte die Kraft des Schicksals von der Schicksalskugel am Rechimas-Weg.
Dämonenabkommen
Abkommenssiegel überprüfen
Prophezeiung: "Begib dich zum Abkommenssiegel."
Die Farben der Lichter des Abkommens ändern

Prophezeiung: "Zuerst musst du die Magie deaktivieren, die das Abkommenssiegel schützt. Finde die Lichter in der Nähe des Abkommenssiegels und sorge dafür, dass jedes in einer anderen Farbe leuchtet, um die Magie zu deaktivieren."
Die Magie deaktivieren, die das Abkommenssiegel schützt

Prophezeiung: "Sobald jedes Licht in einer anderen Farbe leuchtet, kannst du die Magie, die das Abkommenssiegel schützt, deaktivieren. Deaktiviere die Schutzmagie auf dem Abkommenssiegel mit der Kraft des Schicksals."
Monster besiegen, um unreines Blut von Judejan zu beschaffen.

Prophezeiung: "Eine böse Opfergabe ist unerlässlich, um das Dämonenabkommen zu erhalten. Natürlich wirst du keine bösen Objekte bei dir haben. Ideal ist es nicht, aber du kannst aus Monsterblut böse Energie gewinnen. Besiege zuerst Monster, um ihr Blut zu sammeln."
Das unreine Blut von Judejan mit dämonischer Energie anreichern

Prophezeiung: "Das Blut von Judejan reicht nicht aus. Du benötigst mehr dämonische Energie, um eine wahrhaft böse Opfergabe darbieten zu können. Die Dämonen haben rote magische Kreise beim Tamsus-Weg zurückgelassen. Die Dämonen haben rote magische Kreise beim Tamsus-Weg zurückgelassen. Nimm die Opfergabe und betritt die magischen Kreise, um sie mit der bösen Energie zu füllen."
Das Dämonenabkommen in Tamsus Ikeitimas besorgen
Prophezeiung: "Erst, wenn die Opfergabe dargebracht wurde, erhältst du das Dämonenabkommen. Das Abkommen befindet sich in Tamsus Ikeitimas."
Das Dämonenabkommen besorgen
Du hast den Dämon besiegt, der das Abkommen ebenfalls begehrt hat. Nutze das unreine Blut von Judejan erneut, um das Dämonenabkommen in Besitz zu nehmen.
Folgenden Dämon besiegen, der das Abkommen haben will: %s
Göttinnenabkommen
Das mit dem Abkommenssiegel verbundene Dämonensiegel brechen

Prophezeiung: "Das Abkommen wurde sowohl von Dämonen als auch von den Göttinnen versiegelt. Wenn du einen Token des Dämonenabkommens besitzt, kannst du das Siegel der Dämonenseite brechen. Nutze den Token auf dem Dämonenabkommenssiegel, um es zu brechen."
Stein des Glaubens der Göttin finden

Prophezeiung: "Um einen Token des Göttinnenabkommens zu besorgen, benötigst du den Stein des Glaubens der Göttin. Ich habe den Stein am Sviesos-Weg zurückgelassen. Er befand sich in einem Altar, der während Medzio Diena zerstört wurde. Dennoch ist der Stein nach wie vor am Sviesos-Weg zu finden."
Den Stein des Glaubens der Göttin nutzen, um die Inschrift zu lesen und das Siegel zu brechen

Prophezeiung: "Nutze den Stein des Glaubens, um die verborgene Inschrift des Siegels zu lesen. Sprich den Namen der Göttin auf dem Siegel aus, um es zu öffnen. Die auf dem Siegel-Grabstein erwähnten Göttinnen sind Gabija, Vakarine und Zemyna."
Das Göttinnenabkommen beschaffen
Du hast die Inschriften der Grabsteine gelesen und die Siegel geöffnet. Nimm das Göttinnenabkommen in Besitz.
Eine Geschichte von Dämonen und Göttinnen
Abkommenssiegel brechen
Prophezeiung: "Wenn du den Token hast, kannst du das Siegel brechen und den Schlüssel zum Abkommen an dich nehmen. Der Schlüssel öffnet die Kiste, die die Steinplatte mit dem Abkommen enthält.
Die Kiste mit der Abkommens-Steinplatte suchen

Prophezeiung: "Wenn du den Schlüssel hast, musst du jetzt die Steinplatte mit dem Abkommen finden" Gehe zum Judejan-Altar und finde die Kiste, die sich mit dem Schlüssel öffnen lässt. Darin findest du die Abkommens-Steinplatte.
Du hast sowohl die Token des Dämonen- und Göttinnenabkommens, als auch die Abkommens-Steinplatte erhalten. Kehrer zu Kupole Lena zurück.
Bitte Kupole Lena darum, dir zu erklären, wie du den Inhalt des Abkommens lesen kannst.
Verwende den Judejan-Altar, um das Abkommen zu lesen.

Lege die Abkommens-Steinplatte auf den Judejan-Altar und verwende die Token der Dämonen- und Göttinnenabkommen, um den Inhalt des Hauptabkommens zu lesen. Gehe zum Judejan-Altar und lies das Abkommen.
Du musst den Inhalt des Abkommens lesen. Kehre zu Kupole Lena zurück.QUEST_LV_0400_20161221_001585
Du hast den Stein des Glaubens der Göttin gefunden.{nl}Gehe zu Tamsus Ikeitimas und besorge den Token des Göttinnenabkommens.
Entferne das Geheimnisvolle Dämonengerät.
Händler Alta von de Kedora-Allianz hat dich gebeten, das Dämonengerät zu entfernen, das den Bereich um die Alembikhöhle beeinflusst.
Du hast deine Aufgabe erfüllt und alle geheimnisvollen Dämonengeräte entfernt. Erstatte Alta Bericht.
Du bist mit allen Monstern fertiggeworden, bist aber immer noch gefangen. Warte, bis der geheimnisvolle Jäger die Falle entschärft.
Du bist mit allen Monstern fertiggeworden, bist aber immer noch gefangen. Schau einmal, ob es noch eine andere Möglichkeit gibt, der Falle zu entkommen.
Sprich mit dem geheimnisvollen Jäger.
Der Besitzer der Falle ist erschienen! Warte, bis der geheimnisvolle Jäger die Falle entschärft.
Thank you. The Kugheri Zabbis were hiding something...{nl}They could be hiding the orders.{nl}
Please bring me the orders from the Kugheri Zabbis on the road to Stabhas Lot.
Du hast Befehle gefunden, die von den Dämonen auf den Körper eines Kugheri-Zabbi geschrieben wurden. Indraja weiß vielleicht, worum es da geht, bring sie also zu ihr.
Let's follow them.
It's unpleasant but I'll go pollute the holy water with the demon's blood.
Let's go to Ziureti Hall.
Really...I can hear music!{nl}It's putting my mind at ease...
Oh...Goddess Medeina!{nl}You are always by my side.
Goddess Medeina used the trees to sow a song that she could pass on to the priests.{nl}The priests would then break down the metaphorical lyrics to grasp the Goddess' true meaning.
We also need to think about the message behind these lyrics.{nl}Yet, the red pollen from these blooming flowers is so calming...
Ah! I understand the meaning.

I heard people living in Teresh Forest used Teresh Pollen to purify blood.{nl}When the pollen was needed, rather than waiting for it to bloom, they would sprinkle Atti Yellow Juice on it to quickly collect the pollen. Because of this, the flowers appear yellow.
Maybe the Goddess is telling us to sprinkle Atti Yellow Juice on Teresh flowers to collect their pollen.
Atti appear a lot in Skausmas Crossroads and Gydymo Lot.
If you defeat the monsters inhabiting Teresh Forest, you'll be able to find the Yellow Juice.
You've returned with the Atti Yellow Juice.
After spraying the Teresh flower with the Atti Yellow Juice the pollen can be collected.{nl}The flower will die shortly after being sprayed so you must collect it quickly.
In the meantime, I'll collect some Teresh Pollen from Valta Garden.
You've collected the Teresh Pollen.{nl}But there's no reaction. We must be missing something.
That's it!{nl}There may be a response if we sprinkle the pollen around the tree.
The white apple...? I'm not sure of the meaning, but the number of trees humming seems to be growing.{nl}Maybe the trees are all singing the same song.
Let's go examine the trees in Skauda Lot.
The nightly glimmer carried out through to daytime, now my heart is open wide...?
Ah! During the day, people of the Great Woodlands would crush raspberries and sprinkled them around the forest.{nl} This would cause the Starlight to appear.

Like this, they could gather the Starlight together and predict people's fortunes.{nl}So, if we use the raspberry scent to direct the Starlight to the singing trees, we'll be able to receive a response like before.
Wait.{nl}Take this with you.
It'll be easier to collect Raspberry Juice if you use this bottle.
I, on the other hand, will look for branches to use to help spread the raspberry smell.
You've collected enough Raspberry Juice. Now just wait one moment.
I've spread the juice evenly on the branches.{nl}If we just fan the branches to spread the raspberry smell, we can direct the starlight to the singing trees and get a response.
Slowly seeing evidence of Goddess Medeina makes me feel like we are getting closer to her.
We've attracted enough starlight, I think...{nl}But still I don't see anything...
Still, no response...{nl}There must be more to do.
Yellow apple...{nl}I still don't understand the meaning.
Maybe we can learn more from the humming trees in Paslepti Lot.
Goddess Medeina must be talking about the butterflies that come to the flower as the preachers of love.{nl}But "Half of my heart" and "stone"?
This meaning isn't clear.{nl}Is it really talking about a stone? "Half of my heart" must be about the Goddess's heart...
Is the stone really just a stone with no other meaning?{nl}If that's true, is the Goddess' heart written on stone?
I really can't think of the meaning.
The stone, really is just a stone.
It seems I was thinking too deeply.
Ah! You came.{nl}Well, shall we listen to the song?
We need to collect the different colored apples from the trees and place them on the matching pillars.
It'll be fine if we just place the colored apple on the matching pillar.
The ailing Goddess Medeina is recovering in Parias Forest.
If it wasn't for you, Traveler, I wouldn't have known where Goddess Medeina disappeared to.{nl} I'm very grateful.
Well, I'll be going to Parias Forest.{nl}It may be a difficult path but it's where I'll be able to meet the Goddess.
A Dog with no Owner
The dog appears to be looking this way.
Riko why are you back?{nl}Go. I told you to go away...I've already messed up.
A person coming here...{nl}Leave this place. And tell others that Narvas Temple was attacked.
Narvas Temple was made by Agailla Flurry to seal the three divided parts of Hauberk.
The temple's equipment broken down after Medzio Diena, weakening the seal and leaving a small space for Hauberk's energy to escape.

Hauberk's scouts, who felt the energy, and also those who came to destroy him found themselves at the temple.{nl}{nl}In order to protect it, we went searching for the items needed to repair the temple's equipment.
But after being attacked we were left like this.{nl}I want to carry out my mission but there's no chance now.
If it stays like this, Hauberk will return.{nl} Please, in my stead, prevent this. I beg you.
Right now, the way to Narvas Temple is blocked by Hauberk's scouts and hunters.{nl}Going directly through would be dangerous therefore you'll have to distract them.
There is a flower called Sporgimo at Tekel Shelter. When burned it creates a huge blast that will help you distract the demon's attention.
First, set fire to the Hauberk's hunters' camp to lure them away.{nl}Then if you set a fire near where Hauberk's scouts are guarding, after awhile, they will move to that location.
Doing it this way will open up a path to Narvas Temple.
Make your escape. This place, Izoliacjia Plateau, is overrun with demons.
I was looking for parts when I was attacked by demons.{nl}Yet, despite the current situation, you have come alone to this place? That is truly amazing.

{nl}Not too long after my friend left to search for parts, Hauberk's seal broke.{nl}He is currently gathering his scouts and recovering his strength.{nl}Before Hauberk regains his full power I was planning to restore the temple device that prevents the demons from invading Narvas Temple.

That is why, despite the risk, I am working to restore the defensive system.{nl}But the damage to the system is so great that I do not have time to fix them all.{nl}My plan is to alter the ones that were not badly damaged.

The defensive systems in Izoliacjia Plateau received the least amount of damage.{nl}I was planning to fix and alter the system, but there is not enough time to go about it alone.{nl}Would you be able to help?
It is not an easy decision.But it cannot be helped.{nl}I feel like I must ask something difficult of you.
I would be grateful if you helped.
Even if we alter the defensive system here it does not have enough energy to protect the temple.{nl}But, we can use Demon Essence as a source of energy.
Please collect the Demon Essence.{nl}While you do that, I will alter the system.
While you are collecting the Demon Essence, I will alter the defensive system.
Is that Demon Essence? Please give it to me.
I have completed altering the system.{nl}It is time to move on to the defensive system in Ispejimas Lot.
We need at least 4 defensive systems to protect Narvas Temple.{nl}But, and this is including what we already altered, there are only 3 system that we can alter and use.
Therefore, we must alter the detector systems here to defensive ones.{nl}{nl}But Agailla Flurry, to ensure the system ran correctly, also installed auxiliary detector systems.

To change the detectors, the detector and its auxiliary systems must be shut down.{nl}Yet, there are numerous systems. If even one turns back on, the remaining ones will also turn on. Making the task difficult.
As I will shut down energy to the detector systems, I ask that you, Traveler, turn off all the auxiliary systems.
I will shut down energy to the detector systems, so I ask that you, Traveler, turn off energy to the auxiliary systems.
It is completed. We must now alter the defensive systems in Kapetan Pond.
I need to fix some defenses before they can be remodeled, but I need some spare parts.{nl}I can get the parts from a destroyed defensive system, but it's been taken over by demons.
Traveler, are you saying I can leave the demons to you?
If so, then I will quickly retrieve the parts and return.
Traveler, thanks to you, I have recovered the necessary parts.{nl}I will now go to repair and alter the defensive system in Kapetan Pond.
I was just repairing the system when I saw some energy leaving the area around the defensive system.{nl}If all the energy disappears from the defensive system, it will not operate correctly.
I will alter the defensive system, so during that time please retrieve the escaping energy using the Energy Storing Globe.
While I alter the defensive system, please retrieve the escaping energy.
You have returned.{nl}I will now insert the energy.
Good.{nl}Now we must go to the defensive system located on the way to Narvas Temple.
This is bad.{nl}This one is overloaded.
If it continues like this, this defensive system will be completed destroyed.{nl}To cool it down, we need to remove all the energy and turn it off.{nl}If we do not, we will lose the whole system.
I have a request for you.{nl}When I remove the energy it will escape out.
At this time, please collect the energy into the Energy Storing Globe.{nl}Then use that energy to reactivate the defensive system.
I will now turn off the system.{nl}Please wait until I have altered it.
Monk Aistis is currently altering the defensive system.
Defensive system alterations are complete.
To reactive the defensive system we will need to slowly increase the output.{nl}And to increase the output, we will need a lot of energy.
As I increase the output, I will need you to continually insert all the energy you previously collected.
Each time the defensive system requires it, insert the energy you just collected.
The defensive system has activated.
After checking that the defensive system is working properly, we can leave.
We nearly left Narvas Temple open to the demons.
The defensive system seems to be working well. We can make our way back inside.

Agailla Flurry created various demon suppressing, demon weakening, and defensive systems in Narvas Temple.{nl}This was done to defend against invading demons and those trying to release Hauberk's seal.
However, after Medzio Diena these systems were weakened and unable to function properly.{nl}To make matters worse, the demons came and destroyed a few of them.
We need to prevent other systems from being destroyed while also repairing them to stop Hauberk's return.
Good.{nl}Let us move on to the demon weakening systems in Atsargus Hall.
This is good. It seems we have prevented the demons from destroying this system.
This one can weaken the demon's strength.{nl}If we just alter its functions and reinforce it a bit we can use it to limit their power.{nl}
It will be okay.{nl}The demons will have no idea that their strength has been weakened.
I will handle altering the system. Traveler, I need you to collect Strong Essence of Demon that we can use as energy.
It feels like the demons would notice, but trust him and go collect the Strong Essence of Demon
Please do not worry yourself, the demons will pay us no mind.
Reinforcing is complete.{nl} Now on to the systems in Atsargus Hallway.
Hauberk's scouts have already broken this device.
Luckily, since the core of the device has not taken too much damage, I will be able to fix and alter it.{nl}However, would you be willing to help me with one part?
This system, in order to locate unholy beings, runs only on clean essence.{nl}This was to prevent not only demons from coming into the temple but heretics as well.
However, since the area is now overrun with demons, it will be more effective if I alter the system to focus simply on them.
For it to properly track demons, we will need to mix Demon's Blood and Essence together and insert it into the device.{nl}Please collect some tainted essence mixed with Demon's Blood.
I do understand the unpleasantness of this task.{nl}But this is all to prevent Hauberk's return.
It will be fine if you just return with Essence mixed with Demon's Blood.
Please put in the Essence you collected.
Wait a minute. Hauberk is over there.{nl}If you run in hastily, he will capture you and do the same thing he did to the others.
There are too many demons.{nl}It would be better if we first go to Ziureti Hall and check on the system there.
We do not have time to waste.{nl}We should go now.
It is extremely dangerous.{nl}They have already passed on.{nl}We must retreat.
Do you now understand how dangerous this is?{nl}Hauberk could have easily have caught us as well.
Sigh...{nl}Luckily, you successfully interrupted whatever Hauberk was doing.
However, if you were caught, I too would be in danger.
Let us not argue and focus on examining the system that is on the way to Ziureti Hall.
Unidentified Facility
Speak with you...I am Agailla Flurry...apparition...
Deception Hauberk...monk...hypnotize...his side...use you...
As he wishes...Hauberk...tired...follow...what I say...
First...better talk with me...this device...
...to fix...in Tiesa Hall...Apparition Generator...need...
The system password...in Agailla Flurry Chronicles...the completed year...
Narvas Temple...enter locked system password...bring it...put in device...
The system password...in Agailla Flurry Chronicles...is...Narvas Temple...
...completed year...enter locked system password...bring it...put in device...
Agailla Flurry's Spirit
I wasn't able to convey myself fully, however you still knew to unlock the system, bring the Apparition Generator, and fix the device. I'm impressed.
You are talking with me, Agailla Flurry's Apparition, also known as the manager of Narvas Temple.
I left most of the tasks to the monks, but since the three Hauberks woke up and you have arrived, I've decided to intervene.
Monk Aistis' fear of dying at the hands of Ambition Hauberk left his mind weak.{nl}This made it easier for Deception Hauberk to hypnotize Aistis and gain the upper hand.
Deception Hauberk did not anticipate your arrival.{nl}However, after you met Monk Aistis in Izoliacjia Plateau, Deception Hauberk decided to use you aswell.
You were fooled by Deception Hauberk, but the tables have turned.
In this temple is the ruthless, highly ambitions, but non-resourceful, Ambition Hauberk.
The constantly suspicious, concerned with preservation and always careful, is Suspicion Hauberk.
For thousands of years, preparing but not revealing his true intentions to the others, is Deception Hauberk.
To become whole they are keeping each other in check, under contact that they will not involve themselves in each others work.{nl}However, little by little Deception Hauberk is shifting the balance.
The problem is Deception Hauberk is taking the lead to return to his former self, Demon Lord Hauberk.
If this happens we will not be able to stop Demon Lord Hauberk's return.{nl}You and I will use the current imbalance to defeat Hauberk.
Help Monk Aistis and, to completely break the balance of power, take my staff to Deception Hauberk.
I awaited your return.{nl}If you hand over the magic crystal you collected, I will improve the system.
In Ziureti Hall, the weapon that can defy Hauberk, Agailla Flurry's Staff is protected by a device..{nl}We should there and collect the staff.
Return to Monk Aistis and follow what he says.
Able to defy Hauberk, Agailla Flurry's Staff contains an enormous amount power.{nl}Thus, if demons are around, the device protecting the staff will not open.
When there are no demons around, you'll be able to open it.
You can open the device now.
Agailla Flurry Apparition
With that, the balance of power has been shattered.
Use this imbalance of power ignite a fight amongst themselves.{nl}I will explain more in Narvas Temple Annex.

Deception Hauberk has acquired Agailla Flurry's staff but to become whole he must absorb Ambition Hauberk and Suspicion Hauberk.{nl}And to explain to the other two Hauberks, without any misunderstand, the events that have occurred here will be difficult.
However, Deception Hauberk has not concerned himself with how he will go about absorbing the remaining two.{nl}This we will take advantage of.
We will make it obvious to the other two Hauberks that Deception Hauberk is planning an attack.{nl}Plant the idea that Deception Hauberk is weakening them in order to easily absorb them.
Now, if you say that the system in Deception Hauberk's Sealed Hall has been altered, Monk Aistis will say otherwise.{nl}His response will be obvious.
This is because he does not know what goes on here.{nl}Do not worry about the systems. Instead go to Deception Hauberk and do as I have said.
Do not concern yourself with the connection between this and the systems.{nl}If you trust me and follow what I say, we will stop Hauberk.
I will consider what needs to be done and tell you.
If you wish to fix this system, I will need parts from Flurry's device.{nl}These parts are small making them hard to find.
Please use this Absorbing Stone.{nl}When you use it it will  attract the small parts and pull them towards you.
Please use the Absorbing Stone and bring Flurry's Device Parts to me.
Agailla Flurry Apparition
Just as I wanted, you have conveyed the message to Deception Hauberk.{nl}You did well in such a dangerous situation.
Now, we must make Suspicion Hauberk and Ambition Hauberk aware of Deception Hauberk's actions.{nl}Once they are aware, they will begin to fight.

We will start by informing Suspicion Hauberk.{nl}However, seeing as he is a filled with suspicion, if we do not prepare correctly, he will not fall into our trap. Rather he will simply become more suspicious.
You must ransform into the trusted King Hammer and inform him of Deception Hauberk's plan.{nl}Suspicion Hauberk believes himself to be the weakest of the Hauberks.
Therefore, he will concern himself with how to become whole.{nl}At that point, you most reveal the Contract Token you are carrying.

He and the other Hauberks have searched madly for this item that, when he sees it, it will increase his trust in you.{nl}And, tell Hauberk that the Token needs to be changed before use or it will inflict great harm.
If Suspicion Hauberk is of sound mind, he will say to do this right away.{nl}Then leave Suspicion Hauberk's Sealed Hall and come to Ketinimas Hall.
Agailla Flurry left preparations in case Hauberk was awakened and turned his attacks on the monks.{nl}It's the device right next to me.
So that the monks could safety evacuate, this device creates scrolls that change the appearance of the user into a monster.
To create a King Hammer transformation scroll you will need a body essence.{nl}If you collect the Flesh of Black Hohen Olben, you can use that in the device.
First go and collect the Flesh of Black Hohen Olben.
You have done well.
Now we need King Hammer's Blood.{nl}In time, the King Hammers searching for the Contract Token will be passing this way.
Defeat them and insert the King Hammer's Blood into the device.
The transformation scroll is complete.{nl}Now, use this scroll to transform into King Hammer and approach Suspicion Hauberk.
You made that look too easy. Well done.
Now, changing the power within the Contract Token is not easy.{nl}While you were away, I changed the function of the device.
It took time, but it turned out well.{nl}However, the device still does not have the energy it needs to change the power within the Contract Token.
Replacing the energy with condensed magic will be suitable.{nl}Yes, strengthening it with condensed magic will do the trick.
To gain strength, each of Hauberk's Drooper Scouts are in possession of one.{nl}If you defeat them you'll be able to obtain the condensed magic.
Gather it and insert it into the device.{nl}When you have inserted enough, insert the Contract Token and I will transform its power.
You think it's easy changing the Token's power?{nl}Well, in case it was necessary, Agailla Flurry did prepare changeable functions for the devices.
I have changed the power within the Contract Token.
Please inform Suspicion Hauberk of the Contract Token's change.
Suspicion Hauberk has been taken in by your wonderful acting.{nl}We are a little pressed for time, so I will relay the next stage of the plan at Ambition Hauberk's Sealed Hall.
You have arrived.{nl}Now we must reel in Ambition Hauberk.
Ambition Hauberk's Elite Banshee King has died by your hand, correct?
When you defeated the Banshee King, the tortured monks we released.{nl}Due to that, reeling Ambition Hauberk in will not be difficult.
Instead, it will be easier.{nl}You'll be able to brainwash the Black Harugal residing under Ambition Hauberk.
There is one device created by the monks.{nl}It was created by the High Monk in order for them to not forget the important matters at hand.
That device is right here.{nl}If you record the matter into the device it prints it on the Registry Orb.
For a short period of time, one will not forget the demands contained in the Orb.{nl}To make it simple, you can think of it as a type of suggestive brainwashing.
To create this Registry Orb we only need to record two sentences into the device.
First
Deception Hauberk secretly discarded the monk need to transform the spirits.
{nl}Second
To attack Ambition Hauberk, the Monastery's systems were altered.
Maybe there will not be enough words to choose from.{nl}Combine what you can and I will perfect the sentences.
Rememebr, you only need to record two sentences into the Registry Device.
Selecting the words must have been difficult, yet you did well and created the perfect Registry Orb.
Among the Black Harugal are Ambition Hauberk's elite servants. They are marked with a special essence.{nl}This essence is difficult for the human eye to spot.{nl}However, there is a way around this.
Collect the essence of the Black Harugal and we can use it to create an orb that will be able to determine which of the Harugal are Ambition Hauberk's elite servants.
Good.{nl}I will now make an orb that will be able to differentiate Ambition Hauberk's elite servants from amongst the Black Harugal
Just insert the Black Harugal's essence into the device.

Using the Black Harugal essence for comparison, I have made a Mark of Identification that can spot the elite servant.{nl}Use the Mark of Identification to single out Ambition Hauberk's elite servant and then use the Registry Orb.
But I must deliver a warning before you go.{nl}The suggestive power of the Registry Orb does not last long.
And if there is resistance, the effects of the Registry Orb will not be seen.
You must work to weaken the Black Harugal before using the Orb.
And when you use the Mark of Identification, a red glow will appear over the head of Ambition Hauberk's elite servant.
Ambition Hauberk will definitely go to Deception Hauberk.
Wait one moment.
Since Elite King Hammer has not returned, distrust has grown inside Suspicion Hauberk. He is on his way to Deception Hauberk.
Give Monk Aistis Flurry's Device Parts and alter the equipment.{nl}When that is completed, Ambition Hauberk and Suspicion Hauberk will draw near.
If Suspicion Hauberk and Ambition Hauberk see Deception Hauberk with humans, they will not stand idly by.{nl}Especially Ambition Hauberk.
When it appears that they will start to fight, Revelator, turn on the altered system.{nl}The Hauberks will back off when it reacts.
Well then, take the portal device besides me and be on your way.
What took you so long?
It took you this long to find the parts? Well let me see the parts.
You did not falter in this situation at all. Well done.{nl}Just as we prepared, the Hauberks will fight amongst themselves.
There is great power in the Contract Token that will inflict both damage and sap one's energy.{nl}However, you cannot be careless.
Hauberk will sustain a great amount of damage, but he will be stronger and will recover quickly.
Before Hauberk completely retains his power, all of Narvas Temple's energy will be directed to one location in order to defeat him.

I am speaking of the systems Aistis altered.{nl}In the Temple's control system is the Central Control Terminal. The Central Control Terminal will change the system's function set up.{nl}I can change the system myself but I cannot make the final decision.
What I need, Revelator, is for you to make that decision.
Good.
Suspicion Hauberk's elite servants damaged the Central Control Terminal and carried away parts of it.{nl}I need you to find these parts and repair the device.
Once the functions have been set, press the button and the temple's systems will stop running.{nl}This will also affect the systems outside of Narvas Temple.
Right when the systems reboot use the portal.

Take the portal back to Deception Hauberk's Sealed Hall and battle Hauberk.{nl}I will power up the systems altered by Monk Aistis and when they reach the same level of power as Hauberk's I will inform you.
Use the system and attack him.{nl}And I know what I am asking of you is unreasonable.
But I am not asking because you are the Revelator.{nl}I am asking because of the courage, will, and power I saw from you today.
So, I ask that you help me see this to the end.
Of the possible functions, some cannot be used.
You we able to defeat Demon Lord Hauberk with your courage and powerful will.
Since all of the temple system's energy was used while fighting Demon Lord Hauberk, it cannot function anymore.
I am also a part of the temple's system.{nl}This means that if all of its equipment ceases to function, so do I.
That being said, I am honored that, together, we were able to defeat Demon Lord Hauberk.{nl}In your future is a blessing from the Goddess...
If it's "stone" does it mean the tombstones by the trees?{nl}Let's go check the tombstones.
This time too, will an apple grow from the singing trees?
This time it's a blue apple.{nl}It's like the apples are saying something...but the message isn't clear.
Parts of the song I understand and others I don't.{nl}However, I know of a place that has pillars with those three colors.
Let's go straight to Tacasz Stream.{nl}We may learn something from there.
The perfect place to hide
It's the perfect place to hide.{nl}Will you hide here?
As Suspicion Hauberk and Ambition Hauberk draw near, Deception Hauberk's plan will go down the drain.
Be careful so that you are not discovered by either Suspicion Hauberk nor Ambition Hauberk
It's time to make the Hauberks fight amongst themselves.
I am working to stabilize the systems that were altered by Monk Aistis.
This forest carries with it an unidentifiable sound.{nl}Everyone says the forest is either cursed or haunted, but I think there is another reason.
People avoid the forest because they can hear sounds coming from it.

Demon Goddess Giltine came to this place in search of Goddess Laima's revelation.{nl}That revelation should have been for you, Revelator.{nl}Goddess Vaivora believed that Demon Goddess Giltine was looking for a particular book.{nl}One that contained knowledge about her.{nl}But Goddess Laima did not want you to know this much about the revelation.
This revelation contains truths meant for Giltine.{nl}You must do your best to lose it.{nl}Neringa will tell you Goddess Laima's predictions at the time when you are meant to know.
Put your faith in Goddess Laima and Neringa shall work with you.
Outside of us, no one else must learn of Goddess Laima's prediction.

This is Goddess Vaivora's Fantasy Library, which has on record all of the world's knowledge and history.{nl}In this place, you can only view the information meant for you.{nl}You will not be able to see the books that do not.
This place has history and wisdom about humanity that even the Goddesses themselves do not know about.
In the far future, when you are ready to learn of it, you will be able to view it too.{nl}But now is not that time.
Neringa knew you would accept the invitation.{nl}And there is much that needs to be said.

You and Neringa will go together to Goddess Vaivora's domain.{nl}Humans are meant to approach the location primarily by invitation.{nl}But this is still not the case.{nl}There is something you need to know.
Starting from Neringa...
Revelator, you must have some concerns about this current situation.{nl}Neringa will convey Goddess Laima's will to you.{nl}Yet only at the times deemed right.

Together with Neringa, you will go to Fantasy Library.{nl}There you will meet with Goddess Vaivora and her Kupole helper.{nl}They will not welcome a human to the Fantasy Library.{nl}Please do not forget this.

Neringa recommended you for an invitation.{nl}You are here because Neringa helped you to gain the Goddess' trust.{nl}Please continue to build her trust in you.{nl}Focus on listening to her and completing her requests.
Neringa will go first and wait for you.
So, you are the Revelator.{nl}I have heard about you from Neringa.{nl}Where you come from and where you are being pulled towards...I have heard it all.
{nl}Yet, I still have reservations about Neringa's judgement in inviting you here.
{nl}I assume you have already heard from Neringa what it that we do.
{nl}I asked Neringa as well.{nl}What can a human do for us here?
You will have to prove yourself through sacrifice to answer that question.
I strive to prevent humans like you from interrupting the Goddesses' work.{nl}Go help Neringa.{nl}That is something you can do.
As you can see, at the moment there is no opportunity for you to join Goddess Vaivora's plans.{nl}So, solve her smaller issues to gain her trust.

The defensive system in Sausis Room 9 is weak, allowing demons to trespass easily.{nl}But Goddess Vaivora's Kupole cannot stop them alone.{nl}It would be good to take her place.{nl}Defeat a few of the demons and you will gain a lot of her trust.
Your ability is already known.{nl}How much you can do is also already known.{nl}Meaning, what you need to know is already known.

You did well.{nl}Right now Goddess Vaivora is in Valandis Room 3 preparing a trap to capture Demon Goddess Giltine.{nl}She thinks that Giltine wants to get her hands on the book that's about her.{nl}It's not proper work for a goddess, but Giltine won't fall for just any trap.
You will have to work hard to gain Goddess Vaivora's trust.{nl}But the time, and the work that you have to do, has already been decided.

Set your mind towards protecting the Goddess' very precious records.{nl}Everywhere is flooded with demons destroying them.{nl}Please go and collect these Scattered Records.{nl}Doing something as simple as this will surely attract the Goddess' attention.
It would be a great honor for a human to be involved in the fate of the Goddesses.
Doing this much will draw the Goddess' attention.

Goddess Vaivora believes that if Giltine is removed everything will be solved.{nl}This means isolating her from the rest of the world.{nl}But everything that happens is influenced by the demons themselves.{nl}Even if Demon Goddess Giltine disappears other, more uncontrollable versions of her will take her place.

{nl}Sadly, Goddess Vaivora does not have faith in Goddess Laima's predictions.{nl}She also does not have faith in you, who was selected by Laima.{nl}Therefore, here, together with the hand of faith, you must match Goddess Laima's prediction.
Kupole Rugile is alone in Sausis Room 9 dealing with the demons.{nl}Despite being Vaivora's Kupole, she will not be able to handle them all alone.{nl}You must help Kupole Rugile.

{nl}However, Vaivora's Kupole will be weary of you since you are a human.{nl}Before approaching her, remove the Kupole trap set by the demons.{nl}Rugile will show interest in you after this.{nl}And,of course, this interest will be conveyed to Goddess Vaivora.
We must be aware of the situation.{nl}Observe everything and tell Neringa.
Kupole Rugile
You are the human Neringa invited.{nl}There is something a human can do to to help us...
You seem strong enough and ready to serve the goddess.{nl}If there is no other place you must be, can you help me?
It's a difficult situation.{nl}Vaivora and I sealed off all of the passages used by the demons.{nl}But how are they still able to enter?

{nl}Certainly, by someone's help they are entering.{nl}This scroll can detect the small gaps in which the demons are using to invade.{nl}With this scroll, find the point of invasion and remove it.{nl}I will not be able to hold out for long if this continues.
This place has been run by Goddess Vaivora and the Kupoles for a long time.{nl}This place is unbeknownst even to the followers of Vaivora.
Well done.{nl}Maybe you will be able to help Goddess Vaivora just like us Kupoles.
It's more than just a few demons that have entered.{nl}And they are ruining the library.{nl}I do not know what it is they seek, but I cannot allow them to touch the records at will.
{nl}Please get rid of the demons you see in the area.
Possibly the records of the great and unnamed kings have already disappeared. {nl}As time passes, so will more and more records.{nl}Please stop the demons.
Thank you so much.{nl}Thanks to you we can protect the records that are under our care.

After seeing your actions here, it seems you would be an even greater help to the Goddess.{nl}We will tell the Goddess of your courage and sacrifice.{nl}Now return to Neringa and tell her of your accomplishments.
And, by all means, please use your power in the correct place.
You have returned.{nl}The news of you helping Rugile has been passed on to Goddess Vaivora.{nl}We can now move on to the next stage.
You with Neringa will meet someone you have had a long ill-fated relationship with.{nl}Let's go to Sausis Room 10.{nl}
You are the first to be invited here.{nl}In the past, there was commotion because of those who were not invited.
Not yet.{nl}I will call you when it is time.

Slowly more and more demons are invading.{nl}It's hard for me to figure out alone how they are coming here.{nl}I've done all I've could but it's not enough.{nl}However, if you can help me, I will be able to gather some time.
Suspicious magic gathering demons have been found.{nl}If you can defeat them, it will decrease the amount of demons coming this way.{nl}Please do this for us.
Although I know a great scale of the Fantasy Library, there are thousands of areas.{nl}If the demons enter through another location this will cause huge problems.
At least I have one less nuisance to deal with.{nl}I appreciate your help.
The invading demons are damaging the books.{nl}They do not hesitate with their meaningless plundering.{nl}Maybe their leader said to destroy whatever they could get their hands on.
If you want to help the Goddess don't allow them to run away with the records.{nl}Please recover the unidentified records that the demon's stole.
We still have not found a place for all that is contained in the Fantasy Library.{nl}The records that Vaivora and us, the Kupole, still need to classify are slowly coming in.
I see the damaged records.{nl}Those demons...
After this is done, Vaivora will punish those demons.{nl} Thank you for your help.
Everything has been decided.{nl}Even if you try to fight your destiny, the end will be the same.{nl}You are on the right track.{nl}You are doing well.
Vaivora will help solve everything.

Goddess Vaivora has almost completed her plan.{nl}But we cannot have the Beholder interfere.{nl}Your work here should stand out.{nl}Therefore, Vaivora will have a request for you in the next District.
This place is overrun with the Beholder's plans.{nl}Everywhere the Kupole are falling into its traps and getting into trouble.{nl}We must rid Sausis Room 10 of the Beholder's shadow.

Destroy the first corrupted crystal.{nl}If you leave the corrupted crystal alone, the Beholder and the demons will continue to harass the Kupole.{nl}And, remember, the fact that Neringa is here must not be revealed.
The Beholder thinks the situation will go according to plan.{nl}But everything will go as predicted.{nl}Focus on your role.
Destroying that many will be enough.{nl}It will be troublesome if the Beholder becomes aware of us.
There should be an easy way to get rid of the corrupted crystals.
Kupole Saya is dealing with the invading demons here.{nl}But there were so many, she went into hiding to replenish her energy.
{nl}You will present a good impression if you defeat the demons that are near her.{nl}Defeat the demons and then go to Kupole Saya.
There is no better way.{nl}Follow the chosen path.
Kupole Saya
You are the human traveling with Neringa.{nl}I'm surprised that a human can defeat these demons.{nl}You could be a powerful asset to Vaivora.

As the demons invaded they destroyed most of the protection crystals.{nl}If they are not restored the demons will treat this place like their house.{nl}If you want to help Vaivora, first help to restore the protection crystals.{nl}Please lend a hand.
The protection crystals were shattered into Trasium Pieces. {nl}Please collect as many Trasium Pieces as possible and return to me.
I do not know how far you will accomplish..{nl}but I will not refuse you even if you fail.
{nl}Whereever you go, you are still just human.
I'm surprised!{nl}You have completely changed my thoughts about humans.{nl}Have all humans become as strong as you?
While you were away Neringa contacted me.{nl}I told her about your skillfulness.{nl}But Neringa's thinking seem a little different.
You did well.{nl}Saya has praised you.{nl}Now there is only one more Kupole to save.
I'm planning to collect Trasium Pieces in order to restore the protection crystals.{nl}I hope we can use your strength when the time comes.

The Beholder has installed a magic prison to keep the Kupole trapped.{nl}Goddess Vaivora's main helper, Kupole Ouida is there as well.{nl}If you save her, Goddess Vaivora's expectations of you will rise.
{nl}Destroy the magic prison and save Kupole Ouida.{nl}She will then have a request for you.{nl}After that we will meet the Beholder.
I trust and follow you in accordance with the prediction.{nl}Refrain from unnecessary actions and concentrate on your role.
Kupole Ouida
And you are?{nl}A human I see...
I thought I would be saved by Vaivora..{nl}It's not what I expected but thank you for rescuing me.{nl}{nl}

The Beholder has installed magical prisons everywhere.{nl}The Kupole are in a state of confusion allowing the Beholder to rummage through the library.{nl}But we cannot allow this to continue.{nl}Will you allow them to roam around Vaivora's library?{nl}Open your eyes.

{nl}The reason they can roam here is because the protection crystals were destroyed.{nl}The remaining one is being attacked by the demons now.{nl}Ride this transportation device to the crystal.{nl}Defeat them all with your power.
You do not need to return to Ouida.{nl}Time is short. We must go to Goddess Vaivora after facing him.
The Beholder must be growing aware that their plan is falling apart.{nl}Soon the Beholder will be here.{nl}Are you ready?
The Beholder follows Demon Goddess Giltine but shows no interest in her safety.{nl}We must leave here.{nl}With Neringa, you will need to go to Valandis Room 2.{nl}When you are ready, follow.
{nl}Neringa will go first and wait for you.
The Beholder still does not know you and Neringa are here.{nl}Neringa will stay out of the way until the Beholder thinks the task is done.{nl}If Neringa is discovered here, Giltine will be alerted.
{nl}Now we have to let them destroy the Fantasy Library.
Why did they come here at this time?{nl}This is troublesome.

Talk of you helping Vaivora's Kupoles is circulating amongst them.{nl}Goddess Vaivora will come to look for you soon.{nl}She will trust in you and tell you her plans.{nl}But you and Neringa's plans differ from the Goddess Vaivora's.{nl}Don't forget this.
{nl}Listen politely to all the Goddess has to say.
{nl}Goddess is coming.{nl}
In fact, Goddess Vaivora has more conviction than Neringa thought.{nl}Neringa will need to execute this plan more precisely.
Kupole Litae and Danute are in charge of this area.{nl}Kupole Danute will still be unsure about you.{nl}But defeat the demons and she will come you way.{nl}Please listen to her request.
{nl}For Neringa's role, Neringa will leave first.
Kupole Litae
I can't believe you came here, but even more so, I can't believe your skills.{nl}I've heard of your courage and sacrifice from the other Kupole.{nl}Thank you very much for coming to help me.
You've arrived.{nl}Did Kupole Litae greet you well?{nl}The Kupole are also different in their thinking and personalities.{nl}Some listen better than others.
Goddess Vaivora will come to find you again.{nl}But before that, there is something you need to prepare.

You and Neringa will face Giltine in Valandis Room 91.{nl}The Demon Goddess can take your life with just one finger.{nl}So please find some Nobrenal Blueprints so that Neringa may use them to protect you.{nl}With Neringa's divine energy and that item, it will be possible to hold back her power.
Unfortunately, Goddess Laima cannot protect you.{nl}However, Neringa will tell you how to protect yourself.{nl}Believe Neringa and follow what Neringa says.
That should be enough.{nl}Neringa will tell you when it is time to use it.
Now go to Goddess Vaivora.{nl}There are still parts Neringa needs to prepare for the plan.
Your help is making the final preparations much easier.{nl}Now, please help us one last time.
{nl}I must leave this place to examine Giltine's actions more closely.{nl}Kupole Danute is coming so please lend a hand.{nl}I hope that you help her.
Kupole Danute
As Vaivora predicted, the demons are gathering her to make it easier for Giltine to enter.{nl}There is no time to waste so I must ask you for two items.
The first is Dimensional Essence.{nl}That will be easy to find around here.{nl}The last one will be a problem...
Defeat the demons and gather their magic source.{nl}After collecting both, come back here.
Now with this you can defend the protection crystals.{nl}I will combine this and make you a tool.

The protection crystals are under attack!{nl}Since all of the library's energy is directed towards the trap,{nl}there is only one protection crystal guarding this area.{nl}If the protection crystals are not working,{nl}Giltine will still be able to escape even if we seal her within our trap.
Take this tool and until the protection crystals are recharged, fend off the demons!
Thank you!{nl}And Neringa has returned as well.{nl}I will go and help with Vaivora's seal.{nl}I'm grateful for your help!
Vaivora has finished her seal for Giltine.{nl}Unfortunately, Giltine will not appear this time.
Please remain calm and do as Vaivora instructed.{nl}Come back to Neringa when the work there is done.{nl}Neringa is preparing for the next plan.
That is a record.{nl}Neringa will give it back to Vaivora.{nl}Right now you must deal with the embarrased Goddess of Knowledge.
Goddess Vaivora knows much more than you or Neringa, expect for the future.{nl}Therefore it is impossible to convince Vaivora
Vaivora will now make an extreme choice.{nl}Give up the revelation and remove Giltine from this world.{nl}She still thinks that is correct.
In the meantime, let's move to Valandis Room 3.{nl}There you and Neringa will listen to the Goddess plans and follow.{nl}Neringa will go first.

Goddess Vaivora has instructed you to collect all the magical energy that can be used on the Sealing Altar.{nl}There are devices around the library that you can collect the magic from.{nl}Please activate them.{nl}The activated magic devices will go where they are needed.
There was a human who came here without an invitation.{nl}But you are the first to be formally invited.
That looks like enough.{nl}Also, Neringa is looking for you.{nl}It would be good if you go.
{nl}I will finish the rest of the work here.{nl} I will be off.
I'm surprised by your work.{nl}Human potential seems to know no bounds.

To play a part in continuing human history, I will tell you something.{nl}Several hundred years ago, Demon Goddess Giltine had already invaded this place.{nl}She was looking for a record of herself.{nl}But at the time she could not obtain it.{nl}So she comes again today.
I do not know where she will use it.{nl}But she is coming to this place soon to get her hands on that record.
We have taken advantage of her greed by preparing a trap.{nl}As she becomes overcome with joy for finally getting her hands on the record, she will disappear from this world.
If she disappears from this world, every problem will be solved.{nl}All of the Goddesses will return to their rightful places and you too may go home.
For this I need your help.{nl}My Kupole are in the final stages of perfecting the trap.{nl}Please help them.{nl}I also have last minute preparations.
Once again, thank you for your courage and you sacrifice.{nl}For the sake of the world, please endure just a little bt longer.
Please collect them quickly!
How's the protection crystal?
Danute is still unfocused.{nl}This may be a handful for a human such as yourself.
But if you have nothing else to do...
Vaivora wants to destroy part of the Fantasy Library in order to prevent others from entering.{nl}But it will not go according to the Goddess' wish.
It's quite unfortunate.{nl}To ensure that the prediction comes true, you must artfully disrupt the Goddess's plan.
And the Goddess must not know that you and Neringa are the ones to blame.{nl}So follow the Goddess's plans for awhile.{nl}When it is time to execute our own plan, Neringa will call you.
To sacrifice a part of the district to capture Giltine.{nl}Vaivora's plan seems reckless.
Vaivora will ask you to activate the sealing device set up in Valandis Room 3.{nl}Go about the task.{nl}Neringa will also do as such.
{nl}Go to Vaivora.{nl}Neringa will call you when it is time.
Time is running out and there are not many Kupoles remaining that I can call...{nl}You will be able to help me.

{nl}Here Skywa is helping me to operate the Bluenode Collapsing Device.{nl}But the energy from this device is calling demons to it.{nl}Please go there and protect the device for me.{nl}If we lose even one, Giltine will slip away.
It hurts me as well to make such a decision.{nl}And I will bear this crime for eternity.
{nl}But to save the world from Giltine's grip...{nl}It's an expensive sacrifice that must be done.
Amazing!{nl}The activated collapsing device will conceal its magic, and will not face attack again.
{nl}Now Skywa will activate the collapsing device remotely.
Next we need to activate the second collapsing device.{nl}However, it does not have enough energy to run.
Gather the Monumental Magic Source around the area of the second collapsing device.{nl}After that, listen to Neringa about what to do next.
{nl}I will return after surveilling Valandis Room 91.
I will not be gone long.{nl}However, while I am away please consult Neringa if you need help.
Our goal is to cause the Balanorth Collapsing Device to overload.{nl}Until then we will continue to follow Vaivora's plan, so as to not alert suspicion.
Skywa is walking around and managing the collapsing devices.{nl}Operating them is simple enough.
Insert the Monumental Magic Source that you have in your possession into the device.{nl}As the device re-energizes, protect it until it can conceal its magic.

Right now the Goddess is checking on Demon Goddess Giltine's rampage in Valandis Room 91.{nl}As pressing as the matter is, the Goddess will not use the Fantasy Library as a burial ground for Giltine.{nl}Please follow the plan thoughtfully and reliably.
You have successfully energized the device.{nl}It's good to know the plan is right on schedule.
{nl}Giltine is currently in Valandis Room 91 searching frankly for the revelation.{nl}Let us finally finish the task before us.
Now, there are only a few devices left to run.{nl}But is there enough time to leave everything to Skywa...{nl}And it would be difficult to protect.{nl}Would you be willing to help Skywa?
{nl}Make your way to Ballandans collapsing device.{nl}Skywa will be waiting for you there.
Kupole Skywa
The human helping Vaivora is you?{nl}This is my first time seeing one, but you seem particularly strong.{nl}I have a job for you..{nl}
Skywa cannot complete this work alone.{nl}Make sure to help.

Not too long ago, I set the Ballandans Collapsing Device.{nl}I was going to activate another device here as well, but the demons swarmed me.{nl}If I waste my time on them, I won't be able to finish the work Vaivora gave me.

{nl}How about clearing out those demons from around the Ballandans collapsing device?{nl}You just need to protect it until the device is set and conceals itself..{nl}While you deal with this, I'll be able to go and finish my other remaining tasks.
Thank you so much!{nl}Humans are so kind, no?
{nl}Alright, I'm going to go finish my other preparations.{nl}I'm counting on you.
Your help is appreciated.{nl}Thanks to you, Skywa was able to complete the rest of the preparations.{nl}Now only Balanorth collapsing device is left.{nl}Shall I give this remaining task to you?
{nl}When all is ready, just turn on the device.{nl}Oh, right Neringa was looking for you.{nl}It seems she also needs your help.{nl}I'll wait here for your successful return.
Everything has been prepared.{nl}And Vaivora has no reason to distrust you.{nl}You received the request to handle the Balanorth collapsing device, no?{nl}
When activating that device, the demon leaders will appear and interrupt you.{nl}When the demon leaders are defeated they will release great amounts of energy.{nl}We will use that.

Please lure the head monsters closer to the Balanorth device and defeat them there.{nl}Their released energy will overheat the device and destroy it.{nl}Then Vaivora's mission will fail in its final step.{nl}Once you have completed this task, you and Neringa will go together to Valandis Room 91.
{nl}Please do not forget.{nl}You must defeat the head monsters when they are nearest to the device.
All of history is recorded in Fantasy Library.{nl}Of course, records about you are also here.{nl}This is a situation where a human is involved in both Goddess and demon history.
{nl}But, sadly, it will not be recorded.{nl}Neringa has destroyed all records of your involvement.
Vaivora has sensed that something has gone wrong.{nl}She believed all to be finished.{nl}But right now there is no reason to care about her.
{nl}Neringa will head towards Valandis Room 91 first.{nl}I will inform Vaivora that the plan has failed.{nl}Then you must come straight to Valandis Room 91.{nl}Neringa will wait for you there.
How did it turn out like this?{nl}The device isn't responding.
You've failed me.{nl}Now I see the human limits.{nl}I was stupid...{nl}But it's not your fault.
It was my fault for giving such an important task to a human.
I...{nl}The next plan is...{nl}To stop Giltine I could...
Everywhere has become polluted and ruined by Demon Goddess Giltine.{nl}Vaivora, before she destroys everything, us included, you must take action.
At this point...{nl}All we can do is collapse the Fantasy Library and trap Giltine...
It's no use.{nl}There is a no way a human can complete against a Demon Goddess...{nl}However, a human chosen by Laima may be different.
{nl}I wish not to put you harm's way.{nl}But I need you to buy us some time until the Kupole and I can figure out how to trap Giltine.{nl}Right now, this is our best plan...
Demon Goddess Giltine is summoning her demons to Valandis Room 91.{nl}Neringa is sure she is residing there.

{nl}You need to stop Giltine before she gets her hands on the revelation and escapes.{nl}To do this you must destroy the dimensional doors used to summon the demons.{nl}Then, you and Neringa will need to prepare a way to keep you safe from Giltine.{nl}But first, destroy the doors.

This incident is coming to and end just as the Goddess predicted.{nl}And your role has become more important.{nl}Neringa will make the necessary preparations and, during this time,{nl}destroy as many Dimensional Doors as possible.

We have almost reached where Demon Goddess Giltine is residing.{nl}Nearby is the revelation Goddess Laima prepared for Giltine.{nl}Giltine has already burned her way through the library to reach that one revelation.{nl}And Goddess Laima has said that you also must be there.
{nl}Stay near Neringa.{nl}Neringa will keep you safe.{nl}But you must also keep Neringa safe from the demon minions.{nl}Now let us follow Giltine.
{nl}Now we only need to follow Giltine.{nl}Stay close. If you get too far away from Neringa, you will be struck by Giltine's power.
The time has come to end this.
Goddess Laima spoke of a day where Giltine's black wings will be broken.{nl}But this is not that day.

{nl}From here forward, you will face Giltine alone.{nl}Neringa did not appear in the final scene of Goddess Laima's prediction.{nl}Under the black wing's shadow is the future.{nl}Suppress your fear and continue forward.
Fate, itself, will protect you.{nl}Go forth.{nl}You are the Revelator.
You have successfully fulfilled Goddess Laima's prediction.{nl}Then, Neringa's role here is done.{nl}But the journey for you has not come to an end.
Now that this is over, Goddess Laima wishes to guide you to Astral Tower.{nl}At the tower will be a revelation for you to find.
At Astral Tower there will be new hardships and revelations waiting for you.{nl}However, all of this follows from Goddess Laima. You will be safe.
Before leaving, report to Vaivora that the revelation was not retrieved.{nl}And that Neringa has also left.{nl}She will not ask you why.
I see.. this is how things turned out..{nl}I appreciate your courage and sacrifice.
This is the second time I have missed Giltine is my own library.{nl}It seems Laima and my sisters will berate me for this...
I knew that Neringa would leave eventually.{nl}She was always around but her presence was never imposing.
If we ever meet again, there is much I want to ask.{nl}But it will have to wait until the world is freed from Giltine's grasp.
Once again thank you for your sacrifice.{nl}And my apologies.{nl}
Please take this with you.
This power was something given to me by Laima through Neringa.{nl}And it was Neringa who told me to pass this on to you, once everything was finished.
Resistor Skirgaila
I'm sorry to suddenly stop you, but could you lend me a hand.{nl}We, as part of the resistance, are doing recon in this area.{nl}
But as were going about this task, the Beholder came and kidnapped our Lieutenant.{nl}There is no one else who can help.Please, please rescue our Lieutenant..
Sorry, I'm really sorry.If we were more focused, this never would have happened..{nl}To push this request on you so suddenly..but a person's life hangs in the balance. Please, I beg you.
Our relationship is in the gutter, but I'm willing to make a deal with you here.{nl}And of course, our intentions are none of your concern.
But you want to save the so-called Lieutenant, and I want to make a simple deal with you that involves Demon Lord Solcomm.{nl}Think before answering.
Alright, here it is. Nearby, Solcomm has installed a Crystal Stone to supply himself with magic power.{nl}Your task is to use this Orb to absorb the magic from the stone and return it to me.
Oh, and I was told that the Crystal Stone is protected by something or another.{nl}You can just investigate that by yourself. You got this, right?{nl}
Alright, good.The Crystal Stone we need to work on is the one in Prieblanda Rest Place.{nl}There are pillars near the stone, so maybe that's the defense systems.

If you activate them in order, the defense field rotating around the crystal will disappear. That will be your cue to absorb the energy.{nl}If you mess up, it won't be a huge problem. But it'll be incredibly annoying.
You still haven't absorbed the Crystal Stone's energy, yet you show no fear. Why is that?{nl}
I'll say it again. Activate each of the pillars in Prieblanda Rest Place in order and when the defense field disappears,{nl}absorb the energy from the Crystal Stone.
There will come a time where you will need my help. Alright, let's move on.{nl}Did you really think doing one task would be enough? Of course not.

The Crystal Stone I knew the most about was the one in Prieblanda. I only know the location of the others.{nl}The next one is at Lemtis Lot. I'll leave investigating the defense systems and absorbing the magic to you.
Why do I want to get rid of Solcomm?{nl}Do you really think that I, the bearer of concepts that existed before humans, will share them with someone such as yourself?
Looks like you succeeded again. Yet, I'm getting a suspicious vibe.{nl}Hm, well, right now the Crystal Stones are most important.{nl}Let's move on.
The next Crystal Stone is in Zibukas Crossroad.{nl}Go ahead first to investigate and I'll follow soon after.
You would think that guy would have appeared by now...Of course, the intelligence was correct.{nl}Don't question things you haven't heard. Now stop staring and let's go.
You sense a strange energy around the Crystal?{nl}It seems that Crystal Stone is protected by a different type of magic. You'll just have to neutralize its effects.
I gave you a magic nullifying tool, no? The time has come for you to use it.{nl}Right now it has no power, but defeat a few of Solcomm's minions and monsters and fill it up with their spirits.
Fill the tool magic by defeating the monsters and Solcomm's minions in the area.{nl}When it's fully charged, go and remove the magic around the Crystal Stone.
And like that, the Stone in this area has been handled...But still...{nl}There should have been some sort of appearance when that human broke the first Crystal Stone.
Are you acting more cautious than before, or are you scared?
The human I brought along ended up breaking the Crystal Stone that was here.{nl}Trying to make my life difficult, I see.{nl}
But despite all this, Solcomm has yet to appear.{nl}And now that I think about it, outside Zibukas Crossroad hasn't been checked. I'll have to inspect there as well.
If Solcomm isn't found, then this whole process has been meaningless.{nl}This doesn't bode well for you either. Go check the location I mentioned.

Since there was a trap in place, there was no use. That's how he kept his Demon Lord status. Pretty arrogant, no?{nl}One can understand Pbeta's interest. Anyway, since there was a trap there, that means he's in this area.
Well, even if it's not necessarily a trap, I think Solcomm is hiding in this area looking for his chance.{nl}Don't be a chicken. Look carefully and smoke him out.
It's disappointing that Solcomm escaped this time, but he won't be free of me so easily.{nl}There are very few places where he can run off too, so it's only a matter of time.
I'm completely grateful that you completed my request, despite its unreasonableness.{nl}And now I know it's shameless to ask you for another, but I do have a favor to ask.{nl}
Our task here is to do recon on the area but certain circumstances have made it difficult.{nl}I trust your strength and I ask for your help. With it, we can safely complete our work here.
Really thank you! The first task is to burn the demon's supply chests.{nl}Before you arrived, I had investigated the area and found a few of them here and there.
The supplies have yet to be arranged.{nl}We cannot miss this opportunity to cause some confusion. I'll provide the materials needed to start a fire, so please help.
What's happening here... It was quite a lucky chance to come here and see Solcomm's movements.{nl}And the Crystal Stone to be broken... the Lieutenant should have been more careful...
Thank you. The demons will also face some confusion over their disappearing supplies.
Seeing as how strong you are, I hope that you can help with another task.{nl}Zibukas Crossroad is always overrun with demons that it makes recon incredibly difficult.
What I'm saying is: our information is a bit outdated. Please take this Parchment and{nl}record the overall layout of the area in that direction. Would this be possible?
For a long time we have been unable to investigate Zibukas Crossroad due to the number of demons.{nl}The resistance would greatly benefit from your help in this matter.
Thanks to you we can finally update our information.{nl}This will surely help the resistance's future plans. Thank you very much.

You mentioned some wagons in the record you wrote. The demons must be using them to move their supplies.{nl}I'll give you the tools necessary to burn down those wagons. Then, the demons will also face some hardships.
If it wasn't for you, we would have missed these small details.{nl}The information you have recorded for us, will help the resistance.
Well done! For the time being, the supply line to this direction has been cut.{nl}You did us a great favor. Really, thank you so much!
Thanks to you, our task has become a bit easier but those demons still weigh on my mind...{nl}To help our recon work run more smoothly, could you please get rid of the demons in the area?
I am forever indebted to you. And I'm sure the Goddess will also hear of the work you have done for us
Just amazing! Work will go on a bit more smoothly now.{nl}Of course, completely eliminating the demons will be difficult, but you are free to try.
Resistor Abraomas

If it's okay with you, I have a small request. Actually a new recruit who went looking for the Lieutenant went missing.{nl}I went searching for him myself but its a bit hard for me to keep moving.{nl}
Any kind of information would be good..{nl}In this vicinity, if you find a clue about the new recruit will you please inform me?
Please... let him be safe. I worry so much. He is full of guts but has so much to learn...Hah.
T-This...belonged to out new recruit! Then this means something did happen.{nl} Ohhh...if only he was more careful...
If... he's really gone... M-maybe across there...? But that would be dangerous!{nl}The number of demons there... I'm sorry but could you please go across there and look for him?
Thank you. I want to go myself but... as you can see, Officer Skirgaila said it is dangerous...{nl}Please go in my stead...
Any kind of trace of him would be good. No matter what you come across, please tell me.{nl}This person is very important to me...
That... belonged to him. That was the extra dragger he carried with him.{nl}Ohh, after gathering all these clues, is it still okay to believe he is still alive?
The last place is Lanko 22 Waters.. that's the demon's post. Which makes me more worried.{nl}Could you please check this final location? Ah, his name
Leonardas
Leonardas.
Although we are not blood relatives, this recruit is like a brother to me.{nl}He always looked up to me and followed me into the army...If he disappears I...Ohhh...
Resistor Leonardas
Wh-Who are you? You? Abraomas asked you to come find me? Ha, haha...thank you.{nl}I really though...I would die...really...I've caused so much trouble...Ah, again, thank you for coming.
I have something to do so, you, go to Lanko 22 Waters. Find Solcomm and kill him.{nl}If you try to pull anything funny, just remember that I have the person you're looking for.
...You've arrived. You've received a request from the Beholder to kill me, no?{nl}Before you do, I have a question. What did the Beholder say about me?
So that's what he thinks... and you are forced to work with him. I understand everything now.{nl}I'll tell you this. The energy that the Beholder has asked you to gather is not mine.{nl}

The true purpose of the Crystal Stones is to record information about the area. In other words, what you collected was information.{nl}Now image if this fell into the Beholder's hands..Where will he use it, I wonder.
You understand quickly.
Killing me
was the request, but there was none for destroying the Crystal Stone.{nl}That's the key. I would recommend interrupting his little plan by destroying them.
I wouldn't say anything bad to a person who was taken advantage of. Now, tell me your thoughts.

Your task is to destroy the two Crystal Stones here and the remaining ones in Lanko 26 Waters.{nl}The ones here and the ones there are connected so using the self-destruction device will work fine. It won't be dangerous.{nl}

Start with the ones over here. Negilus Inner Court is the closest so check that Crystal Stone first.{nl}The security devices are running, so destroy them all. If you do, the Crystal Stone will follow.
Not only that one, but other Crystal Stones are protected in various ways.{nl}This is protect the records from others. What? This information isn't exclusive.
Well... you can also see it from your view.
Hm... fascinating. Next, the Crystal Stone in the garden.
The Stone in the garden is protected by magic, just like the ones you saw in the crossroads in Lanko 26 Waters.{nl}The easiest way to destroy it is to use a bomb that can penetrate and remove magic.

You will have to make this bomb yourself. Here is the recipe and the materials.{nl} The rest are roots that you will have to gather from Lily Velly and Jelly Velly. Once the bomb is made, use it to destroy the Crystal Stone.
Until now the Beholder has only sent his minions and has not appeared himself.{nl}What is he planning...
Very good. Now to address the Crystal Stone in Lanko 26 Waters.{nl}We can overlook what type of plan he is devising, but we cannot allow the Beholder to have his way.
The self-destruction device is hidden between the rocks in Dregnas Lot. Find it and activate it.{nl}But it will take some time, so I recommend keeping a lookout.
Based on what you told me, I've realized that changing the Beholder's mind won't be possible.{nl}Instead, I'm going to thwart his plans. This is the conclusion I've come to.
Now all of the Crystal Stone's are gone. The Beholder must be pulling hairs since his plan had been interrupted.{nl}And he will be on his way. Before all is revealed, I have another request for you.
This request may be difficult for you to accept.{nl}But if you think of your future, this could be profitable. What do you think? Here me out.

Although the result was different from intended, it was acceptable.{nl}I've already returned the Lieutenant you were looking for.He's possibly on his way back to the other resistance members by now.{nl}
Well then, we'll part ways here. Stay alive, at least until we meet again.{nl}That will be my reward, no?
I would like to return, but I've hurt myself here and there, making it hard for me to move.{nl}Would you mind lending me a hand?
Thank you. Could you collect the materials I need?{nl}First you need to water the Lily Velly and Jelly Velly that live here with lake water and then gather their leaves.

Have you heard? The water from Star Struck Lake Water is fatal to demons.{nl}What I'm making now will not be as effective, but I'm trying to make it as close to the level of Star Struck Lake as I can.
Thank you. Now let's move on to the next stage.

I'm trying to craft magical sap that has the effect of Star Struck Lake. However, we need something more than just the leaf.{nl}There are catalysts that promote magical reactions in the demons' storage nearby. Could you bring those to me?

I found that storage in the past while trying to hide from demons.{nl}After going inside, I found a box, and saw the catalyst inside. I wanted to make something like this with the catalyst ever since.
Thank you! All that's left to do is to make the sap.
We're almost done! Can you craft some sap with the ingredients and the bottle I gave you?{nl}Here is the recipe for the sap. I'm sure you're much better at doing things like this than I am...
I really hope this works like I hope it does. Everyone must be worried sick about me.{nl}I've even disobeyed orders to come here??I know I'll be in trouble, but I still want to go back soon.
You're back! We'll be done after testing this sap on a demon.
Here is a bottle of the sap we've made. Find a demon to test this on.{nl}If it works, you'll see its effects immediately. After that, please make sure to deal with the affected demon.
How did it go? Did you have any trouble dealing with the demons?{nl}This is the first time I've actually made the sap, so I hope it worked.
Thank you! I think I've mostly recovered while you were making the sap.{nl}All I have to do now is go back with the sap!
Wait! I'm sorry to bother you, but I need to get back to my friends. However, I'm hurt...{nl}If you can, will you get rid of the demons around here to help me get back to my friends?
There are lots of demons scattered around the way back to my friends.{nl}Would you get rid of these demons for me?
Everyone must be worried about me... I disobeyed orders to find my lieutenant...{nl}I hope Adjutant General and everyone else is okay...
Thank you. There are still some demons left in the area, but the situation has gotten much better.{nl}If possible, come back anytime to help me a bit more.
This is troubling... I guess when it rains, it pours...{nl}Hey! Here! Ahh... Never mind. Sorry to bother you.
My heart goes to you for helping us.{nl}Without you, we would still be regretting what we've done.

Ah, it's you. Welcome. I've just heard that our lieutenant has returned. I truly appreciate your help!{nl}For now, we'll stay here a bit longer to assess the situation. We still need to carry on with our mission.
I should have stopped him when I had the chance... If I have, this would not have happened...
Huh? Is Leonardas still alive? The goddess must be watching over us...{nl}Thank you! And thank the goddess...
Leonardas is getting ready to come back? With his injuries? Oh, goodness...{nl}We need to do something to help him. Thank you.
Is there anything left to do? If you're worried about what I'm doing,{nl}don't bother. You wouldn't even understand. Just keep walking.
Ughh... I need to go back... But my legs won't move the way I want... I hope everyone is okay...
I need to go back to my comrades as soon as I can, but my injuries...{nl}Will you please help me?
Thanks to you, I feel much better. I better get going.{nl}I've come this far, so I'll remain here for a bit to record the area. Thanks for your help.
All right. I'll be brief and to the point.
Ugh... Monsters took off with our supplies.{nl}We were preoccupied with demons...
We need to repair the altar...{nl}No one expected demons to come here and destroy the altar...
Following Jurate's words is becoming harder and harder.
The demons' attacks are growing fiercer by the day.{nl}We need to do something about this...
Emmanuelis
The demons' plan has failed, but there is still much to do.
This was a beautiful land blessed by the Goddess Jurate. But now, it's all ruined.

Das kann doch nicht sein! Ich werde die Mönche retten.
Wir gehen einfach an ihnen vorbei.
Das Geisterverwandlungsgerät wird angehalten
In die Höhle des Löwen (7)
Gehe in das Gebiet.
Los, geh du vor.
In die Höhle des Löwen (8)
Gehe in das gesperrte System, um die Teile zu besorgen.
Ich glaube, das ist zu schwer für mich.
Erscheinungsgenerator wird platziert.
In die Höhle des Löwen (9)
Tu, was sie dir sagt.
In die Höhle des Löwen (10)
Lassen wir das lieber.
