Broken Arrow
Ineta wants you to use the Time Meter at the designated location and defeat the monsters that react to it to collect Broke Arrows.
Acquire the Lost Pendant
Ineta wants you to use the Time Meter at the designated location and defeat the monsters that react to it to collect the Lost Pendant.
Deliver the objects you collected with the Time Meter at Outer Wall District 15 to Ineta.
Kedora Alliance Ineta is waiting for you at the Outskirts Bridge in Outer Wall District 15.
Ineta has asked you to use the Time Meter on the Lost Pendant.
Talk to Kedora Alliance Ineta
Kedora Alliance Ineta is at the Outskirts Bridge in Outer Wall District 15 and she wants to tell you something.
You know who the owner of the pendant is. Bring the pendant to Pajauta.
A New Attack
Talk to Schaffenstar Adjutant Apollonius
Schaffenstar Adjutant Apollonius seems to be in trouble. Talk to him.
Defeat the Incoming Demons
The demons are attacking the Schaffenstar members! Talk to Apollonius and defeat the demons.
You have defeated all the demons, but you are still in danger. Talk to Apollonius.
Ask Apollonius about what is happening.
You have agreed to help Apollonius. Talk to him again when you are ready.
Know Your Enemy, Know Yourself
Schaffenstar Adjutant Apollonius wants to tell you where to start. Talk to Apollonius.
Defeat Nearby Demons to Collect Orders
Apollonius wants you to collect written orders from nearby demons. Defeat the demons and obtain their documents.
You have enough written orders now. Bring them to Apollonius.
Obtain the Demons' Orders
Schaffenstar Adjutant Apollonius is looking for ways to assess the demons' plans. Talk to Apollonius.
Apollonius wants to try turning into a demon in order to spy on them. Find the Druid Master and ask for her opinion.
The Druid Master gave you a potion. Take it to Apollonius.
Apollonius wants to share the potion and start the investigation. Talk to him.
Transform and Spy on the Monsters
Apollonius wants you to use the potion to collect information from the monsters. Disguise yourself with the potion and trick the monsters into talking to you.
You have collected enough information. Report back to Apollonius.
Apollonius seems worried. Talk to him.
Tell the Schaffenstar Soldier to Light the Signal Fire
Apollonius wants you to tell the soldier to light the signal fire and alert the others.
Ask Resistance Adjutant Benjaminas in Barynwell 85 Waters
Tell Resistance Adjutant Benjaminas in Barynwell 85 Waters about the information you collected with Apollonius and ask for his assistance.
Apollonius is ready to block the enemy's attack. Talk to him.
Block the Demons' Attack
The demons are planning a full-scale attack. Resist their attack until the Resistance forces arrive.
You have resisted the attack with the help of the Resistance! Talk to Apollonius.
Talk to the Wounded Soldier Spirit
A painful wail is heard coming from somewhere. Find the source of the noise.
Protect the Wounded Soldier Spirit
The soldier spirits suddenly turned into demons! Protect the Wounded Soldier Spirit from them to hear the full story.
You have defeated all the demons. Talk to the Wounded Soldier Spirit.
Talk to the Royal Soldier Spirit
The Royal Soldier Spirit wants to tell you about what happened here. Talk to her.
Seek the Taoist Master's Advice
The Royal Soldier Spirit wants to seek advice on the situation. Visit the Taoist Master and explain what happened.
Seek the Exorcist Master's Advice
The Taoist Master believes the Exorcist Master might have a better answer for you. Visit the Exorcist Master.
You have received the help of two Masters. Report back to the Royal Soldier Spirit.
Stick the Purifiers to the Tombstones
The Royal Soldier Spirit wants you to stick the Purifier sheets to the tombstones emitting evil energy. Place the sheets on nearby tombstones.
The Purifiers were effective! Report back to the Royal Soldier Spirit.
The Royal Soldier Spirit wants to tell you about the next step. Talk to her.
Use the Purifying Holy Water on the Demons
Use holy water to purify the spirits that turned into demons! But remember, the spirits need to be weakened first before you can use the Purifying Holy Water.
You have purified the spirits and they can now rest in peace. Report back to the Royal Soldier Spirit.
Curse, Begone!
The Royal Soldier Spirit wants to tell you how to get to the source of the curse. Talk to her.
Disable the Switchgear Barrier
In order to reach the Switchgear, you need to solve a puzzle! Operate the pillars by the order in which they shine to disable the barrier around the Switchgear.
Operate the Switchgear
The barrier is gone! Now, operate the Switchgear to open the gate to the Drill Seargent's Lab.
Operate the Switchgear to open the gate to the Drill Seargent's Lab, where the source of the curse is.
Defeat the Deranged Vel's Chariot
A Vel's Chariot appeared as you were trying to operate the Switchgear! Defeat the monster.
The coast is finally clear. Operate the Switchgear and open the gate.
Defeat the Deranged Vel's Chariot
Install the Sculpture and Defeat the Demons
You're ready to suppress the evil energy coming from the Drill Seargent's Lab. Set up the Goddess Sculpture near the source of the energy and defeat any demons that try to stop you.
The sculpture is working, but it's not enough to dispell all the evil energy around. This may not be the source of the curse. Report back to the Royal Soldier Spirit.
Talk to Resistance Adjutant Antanina
Resistance Adjutant Antanina is calling for you. Talk to her.
Antanina has "convinced" you to work with her. Talk to Antanina again when you are ready.
Destroying the Obelisks
Resistance Adjutant Antanina wants to explain her plan. Talk to her.
Investigate the Obelisk in the Armory
Antanina is off to destroy the obelisks. According to her notes, you need to destroy the one in the Armory. Go there and investigate the obelisk.
Place Explosives Around the Obelisk

According to Antanina's notes, you need to get some explosives from the boxes or barrels and place them by the obelisk. Then, find a bomb and throw it at the explosives from a safe spot to destroy the obelisk.{nl}Follow the instructions on Antanina's notes.
Destroy the Obelisk in the Armory
The explosives are ready, and you also have the bomb now.{nl}Move to a safe spot and throw the bomb to destroy the obelisk.
Investigate the Obelisk in the Training Grounds
After the Armory, Antanina's notes tell you to move to the Training Grounds. Go there and investigate the next obelisk.{nl}
Defeat Nearby Demons for Clues
The obelisk here can't be destroyed by force alone. Defeat nearby demons to obtain clues on how to destroy it.
Investigate the Obelisk
The defeated demons dropped fragments of different colors. Investigate the obelisk in the Training Grounds and figure out how to destroy it.
Place the Fragments on the Platforms
It looks like you need to place the fragments on the platforms in order. But be careful: if you use the wrong order or fall into a trap, the demons might notice and come running.
You have destroyed all the obelisks. Report back to Resistance Adjutant Antanina.
Defeat Moringponia by the Portal
Just as you were trying to destroy the portal, Demon Lord Moringponia appeared! Defeat the demon to get to the portal.
You have defeated Demon Lord Moringponia. Check Resistance Adjutant Antanina.
Antanina looks like she wants to ask you something. Talk to her.
Install the Suppressor and Destroy the Portal
Antanina wants to install a suppressor and destroy the portal. Install the Suppressor by the portal.
The portal has been destroyed. Report back to Antanina.
Talk to Kupole Astra
Find Clues
Kupole Astra is trying to find Goddess Medeina, but she's all out of clues.{nl}Go to Spindintis Lot and look for another possible lead.
Check the Butterflies
Kupole Astra finds it strange that a group of butterflies nearby lives away from the flowers.{nl}Go near the butterflies and check whether they react to your flowers.
Go to Drugelis Hill
Kupole Astra believes the song is leading you to Drugelis Hill.{nl}Go there.
Check the Blooming Flowers
Kupole Astra thinks the multi-colored flowers on the hill are your only clue.{nl}Go near the flowers and check whether they react to your leaves.
Use the Sealing Scroll on the Magic Stone

Kupole Astra wants to do something about the Magic Stone that's supplying power to the forest's evil barrier.{nl}Go to Grazus Cliff and use the Sealing Scroll on the Magic Stone that's installed there.
Restrain Demon Lord Tantaliser
Lure Demon Lord Tantaliser to the white circle in front of the Kupole and use the Binding Scroll.
Go to the Gyvenimas Shelter
Kupole Astra wants to go to the Gyvenimas Shelter, where the song is leading you. Follow her there.
Cross the Tesiamas Falls to Mazas Pond
Kupole Astra believes the last part of the song is referring to the Mazas Pond.{nl}Cross the Tesiamas Falls with her into Mazas Pond.
Go to Mazas Pond
Kupole Astra is still unable to move, but she wants you to continue on to Mazas Pond to find more clues.{nl}Go to Mazas Pond.
Talk to Kupole Ilona
Kupole Ilona says there is a similar Magic Stone at the Poilsis Pond and she wants to seal it away.{nl}Go to Poilsis Pond and use the Sealing Scroll on the Magic Stone there.
Follow the Firefly With Kupole Ilona
Ilona believes the firefly is guiding you to the location of Goddess Medeina.{nl}Follow the firefly with Kupole Ilona.
Talk to Goddess Medeina
Collect Vivacious Grass

Goddess Medeina needs to restore some of Her health before using the seed, but she is still too weak.{nl}She wants you to use the seed to regenerate a dying plant instead, then bring back the revived plant.
Help Goddess Medeina
Goddess Medeina wants you to help Her until She regains Her health.{nl}Do as the Goddess says.
Collect Tree Branches
Goddess Medeina wants to create something to trick Demon King Kartas.{nl}Use the seed to instantly grow the young maple trees on the path to Syla Forest, then collect a branch from those trees.
Seal the Seed's Energy

Goddess Medeina is still worried that the Seed of the Divine Tree might fall in the hands of someone like Kartas.{nl}In order to use the seed only for healing, the rest of its powers need to be sealed away, the tools for which are located in this region.{nl}Activate the goddess' altar in order to seal away the seed's energy.
Protect Kupole Ilona
Kupole Ilona's call gave away her location to the demons.{nl}Protect Ilona from them.
Talk to Kupole Yulia
Find Kupole Ilona
Kupole Yulia wants to find Kupole Ilona immediately.{nl}Join Yulia and find Kupole Ilona.
Talk to Kupole Illina
Talk to Kupole Ilona and Defeat Nearby Demons to Collect %s
Medeina's TracesParias Forest
Kupole Ilona says that there is an orb in the center of Parias Forest that Goddess Medeina left behind for an emergency.{nl}Use the orb to find traces of Goddess Medeina.
Go to Ruduo Garden
Kupole Ilona says Medeina's traces end near the Ruduo Garden.{nl}She wants to venture into the garden for more clues.{nl}Follow Ilona into Ruduo Garden.
Collect Red Banterer Essence

Kupole Yulia believes that destroying the Support Magic Circles will weaken the Teleportation Magic Circle.{nl}Unfortunately, they can't be destroyed by force alone. You will need to collect the essence of Red Banterer monsters and add them to the magic circles in order to overload them.{nl}Defeat Red Banterers and collect their essence.{nl}
Defeat Red Banterers to Collect %s
Suppress the Power of the Magic Stone

Goddess Medeina says the only way to disable the barrier covering the forest is to stop a Magic Stone from supplying power to it.{nl}Go to the location of the Magic Stone and use the goddess' scroll to seal away its power.
The demons have found you.{nl}Protect Goddess Medeina from them.

We will start by informing Suspicion Hauberk.{nl}However, seeing as he is filled with suspicion, if we do not prepare correctly, he will not fall into our trap. Rather he will simply become more suspicious.
It's too late for me, I'm injured. You need to save yourself!
Thank you for saving me. I can't believe you took down all those monsters... Who are you?
Oh, you're the famed Revelator.{nl}It's an honor to meet you.
I'm part of the Recovery Squad that's trying to take Barynwell 27 Waters back from the monsters.{nl}I was attacked by the monsters during a recon mission.
I thought I was done for until you appeared. Thank you for saving me.
Thank you, Revelator!{nl}You can put it inside this bottle.
You're back so soon?{nl}Well, you're the Revelator after all.{nl}I'll try and get my wound cured before the poison spreads any more.
Thank you, Revelator!{nl}The camp is at the end of the road, up from where we are right now.
We'll be sending a rescue team right away.{nl}Come to think of it, I never really introduced myself.{nl}I'm the Adjutant of the Recovery Squad here.
Thank you.{nl}I may wear the Schaffenstar uniform, but I am not a member.{nl}I was, once, but I abandoned the Tower with my mentor, who failed to become an Elder at the organization.
My mentor couldn't give up his dream of becoming a Schaffenstar Elder, and he tried desperately to make his name known.{nl}One day, he gathered all of his apprentices and he told us.

He said the Astral Tower, our home, was being attacked by demons... and we needed to get it back.{nl}We had already abandoned the Tower, but we couldn't just stand idly by and watch the demons take over it.
After we arrived in 27 Waters, he told us Lydia Schaffen's lost relic was near.{nl}He said finding the relic would help us defeat the demons.
We started to look for the relic and take down the monsters.
Every day we would fight and search, fight and search.{nl}Even when we were injured, the thought of finding the relic and taking back our home kept us going.
Many of us never made it.{nl}Myself and a few others were barely holding on to our lives.{nl}We realized it would be impossible for us to take back the Tower on our own with all those monsters.
You're back.{nl}I told my colleague to go call our mentor, but no news of them yet.{nl}I guess I'll start by talking to the ones that just arrived.
Even when the demon portal appeared... I'm talking too much.{nl}I apologize.{nl}Let's talk about our plans first.
We can't receive external help, so our resources are scarce.{nl}This is our last chance to do anything.{nl}Let's make sure we succeed.
Are you ready?{nl}Okay, I'll lure the monsters in now.{nl}Go to the location and wait there.
The operation was risky, we were ready for the worst.{nl}Luckily with you here, everything worked out better than expected.{nl}Thank you for doing right by our comrades.
Great job taking down the portal.{nl}We can finally look for our comrades' keepsakes.
Also... our mentor is back and he wants to talk to you in private.{nl}I'll be setting up things so we can start searching the Old Concert Hall area in the meantime.
Ah. Welcome, Revelator.{nl}I heard news of you arriving during my search. As you know, we're looking for the relic that will let us take over the Barynwell areas.
My students told me you helped them take down the demons.{nl}We are very grateful.
As their mentor, I apologize for letting them pull you into all this trouble.{nl}That said, if you do agree to help us, finding the relic will only be a matter of time.

I know my students must have complained to you about what's been happening.{nl}But now that the portal is destroyed, we can finally search the Old Concert Hall.{nl}That's the only area we haven't searched yet.
I'm certain that the relic will be there.
I gave out orders to begin the search there already.{nl}Please, have some rest before you join us. I understand you just went through a difficult battle.
You're back.{nl}We managed to find our colleagues' keepsakes in the meantime.{nl}Thank you for the help, really.
We also found a hidden location in the Old Concert Hall.{nl}Let me show you what was inside.{nl}This is...{nl}
Thank you.{nl}I'm glad you are as kind as you are talented.
We wouldn't have gotten our defense back up so quickly without you.{nl}Thanks.
Are you sure? That's... very kind of you, thank you.{nl}To tell you the truth, many of our soldiers were injured in the last battle.{nl}I'm glad you're here to help.
You're done already?{nl}Well, you really can't beat experience, can you?{nl}I'm honestly impressed, Revelator.
Thank you for your service.{nl}The last battle was hard on us, many were injured during the conflict.{nl}This time you truly gave us the upper hand.
Before you arrived, we had other confrontations with the monsters.{nl}Each one left several of our soldiers injured.
The problem is that they keep coming, while our forces grow weaker and weaker.{nl}The soldiers' morale is lower than ever.{nl}Do you think you can help lift their spirits a little?

Thank you, Revelator.{nl}I sent him a carrier pigeon earlier, so he should know you're coming.{nl}To get to the Collapsed Shelter, just go up this way and take a left before you reach the entrance to the Observatory.
Revelator! Hello!{nl}I'm a student of Mr. Brockal Himil, the one who's investigating the monsters.{nl}Mr. Himil told me you helped our forces back at the camp.
Thank you, Revelator.{nl}I'll go and set up some bombs at Maven Intersection.{nl}You can do the same around the Collapsed Observatory.
The bombs are all set.{nl}Time to lure in the monsters.
I can't believe you took down that monster before I could even send out a carrier pigeon...{nl}You really are something special.{nl}I admire you.
That was close, I'm glad you were around to help me.{nl}Let's report back to Mr. Himil.
Revelator! We heard a monster, I was just about to gather our forces.{nl}What on earth just happened?
I'm still amazed that you took down the leader on your own.{nl}And thank you for saving my student.{nl}We're really fortunate to have you here.
Thank you.{nl}I was so nervous, I'm glad you were here to help.
Thank you, Revelator!{nl}I'll protect this lake with my own life.
I was so afraid all this time...{nl}But no more.
I know we're going to win this battle with you.{nl}I'm never going to give up.
Hi there. Are you a traveler?{nl}Be careful around here, this place has been full of monsters and water plants since Medzio Diena.
A Revelator... oh, you're the Revelator!{nl}I guess I was worried for nothing, then.{nl}I heard that you help people you are in trouble... Can you help me too?
Oh, thank you!{nl}Ever since Medzio Diena, the water plants around here have been growing bigger and faster.{nl}It's been getting harder and harder for me to take care of the lake.
Would you help me get rid of the water plants around the watch post?
Wow, you're great at getting rid of those heavy water plants!{nl}I can't even pick them up.{nl}If I become a member of the Schaffenstar, will I be strong like you?
You don't have to move all of them!{nl}Just take some and I'll do the rest.
You moved all of them?{nl}Wow, that was enough work for half a day... Thank you.{nl}Now let me show you how to process the plants with the machine.
Um, Revelator... We have a problem.{nl}I never tried to process this many plants...{nl}I don't think my magic source is gonna be enough.
I'm gonna get some more magic sources.{nl}You just wait here.
What? You wanna help?{nl}But you already helped me move the plants... Thank you!{nl}You can find some magic sources at the Old Warehouse. They're like shiny stones, you'll see them right away.
You helped go through so many water plants.{nl}Thank you!{nl}If that's okay, will you help our leader at the Laker Temporary Base too?
I see. You're a Revelator. I'm sorry for being so suspicious.{nl}Most of us Lakers come from villages around the lake.
So... we can handle the plants now, but the monsters are another story.
I learned how to fight from a mentor who's no longer with us.{nl}But most of the Lakers were never trained in combat.
I learned how to make poison from my mentor.{nl}They're a famous hunter, you see.
They had to leave because of something, but they should be back someday.{nl}And be careful, the Old Stakeout Box is still full of monsters.
Great.{nl}I hope the monsters didn't give you too hard of a time out there.
The giant one is still knocked out from the spiked bait.{nl}We should get going before it wakes up.
That was fast.{nl}I've just finished the poison, too.
Time to take care of that giant monster.{nl}Sigh... I'm a little nervous.{nl}I'll be counting on you for this.
Glad to see you're safe, Revelator.{nl}I'm sorry I couldn't help.{nl}I don't know what would happen to me if you weren't around.{nl}
Uhh... this wound's more serious than I thought.{nl}I need to have it checked back at the camp.{nl}I'm really sorry, Revelator, but there's one more favor I want to ask of you.
You got the materials. Great.{nl}This should keep us safe for a while.{nl}But of course,  we'll need to be on the lookout for any new threats.
The borders are safe for now,{nl}but the monsters have been acting strange recently.{nl}I really don't know what to do...
I did have my qualms about Mr. Himil, but deep down I really trusted him.{nl}When he first stepped up as our leader, he was a really honorable man.{nl}I don't know what made him change like that...
I will reorganize the party for the time being.{nl}I am way too tired, both body and mind.
When we are done, we will make preparations to reclaim the area.{nl}We need to study the equipment parts that we've found and ask for help and...
I still don't get it...
I know it's suspicious, but we can't help but agree to his terms as we have no other choice.{nl}Revelator. Do not hesitate to back away when you find something suspicious.
Sigh... Oh my, this is really getting out of my hand.{nl}There... There must be a way...{nl}
Oh, I didn't see you there. I was thinking too hard to notice someone approaching.{nl}Wait... Maybe you could...{nl}
Will you lend me an ear for a second? This is very important.{nl}The future of the entire Kingdom... Or even, mankind is at stake.{nl}
As always, I was honing my mastery of the moon's shadow.{nl}Then I got the idea to enter the shadow of the moon itself in order to better understand my craft.{nl}
I've tried acting out my theory but I wasn't powerful enough so I thought to harness the power of the moon itself.{nl}When I performed the necessary rites, a mysterious portal opened before me.{nl}
At first, I thought my hypothesis was correct and entered the portal, thinking it would lead me inside the moon's shadow.{nl}But inside the portal, I found myself in a strange landscape.{nl}
It was different from where we are now... A strange dimension that existed on a different plane from our own.{nl}I was disappointed and attempted to return to my world.{nl}
I turned around to head back out through the portal which I entered.{nl}It was then that I heard a frightening roar. That dark and grotesque energy...{nl}
I turned to see a large demon standing in front of me. It was...{nl}It was trying to head out into our world through the portal I had created.{nl}
I don't know why the demon was there, but I knew one thing through my instinct.{nl}I realized quickly that if the demon escaped through the portal it would pose a great threat to our world.{nl}

I had mustered all the strength I had to bind the demon in its place.{nl}On top of that, I crafted some devices in preparation for the worst case scenario, returned to our world and closed the portal.{nl}

But that wasn't enough. The demon's power is so great that even as we speak, I can feel that it is slowly freeing itself from the spell I had put on it.{nl}If it breaks free... And enters our world... I don't know what would happen...{nl}
We cannot let this demon go free. I need a lot of help in order to keep the demon bound in its dimension.{nl}You are a revelator, are you not? Could you lend me your strength?{nl}
I need all the help I can get in order to resolve this crisis at hand.{nl}Please, save the world from its certain doom by stopping this terrible demon.
Thank you. I feel assured to have your word that you will help.{nl}It will be an arduous battle. Come back and talk to me again after you have made the preparations.

Now, I will open the portal... I mean the dimensional rift that will lead us to where the demon is.{nl}As I've said before, you will find a few devices that I have built in order to stop the demon getting free.{nl}
It will not activate right away as it was put together in a haste.{nl}But if it does activate, eventually, it will be helpful to you.{nl}
Brace yourselves, and enter through the portal when you're ready.{nl}I will follow you shortly.
I will help you carry the Water Plants.
It looks too heavy.
Help defeat the monsters.
It's going to be okay.
Go to the designated area.
I need some time to prepare.
I will gather the materials for you.
I want to rest for a bit.
From a Mistake to a Threat
I can't do it.
Placing the flesh of Black Hohen Olben
Eclipse Ubik, the Shadowmancer Master, seems to be worried about something. Talk to the Shadowmancer Master and ask her what's wrong.

The Shadowmancer Master needs help sealing away the demon she had come across during her studies. The demon is very powerful so she needs capable adventurers to assist her. Talk to the Shadowmancer Master when you're ready.
Talk to Kupole Ilona and defeat the Red Banterers in the vicinity to collect %s.
